analysis.description:
tickets.addressesReserving (/unique_chucks/24/0xd64dce6f3f3e27b7afc5eda41ebab00556eaf946.sol#16-17) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- resetReservationsInternal (/unique_chucks/24/0xd64dce6f3f3e27b7afc5eda41ebab00556eaf946.sol#82-101)

tickets.resetReservationsInternal (/unique_chucks/24/0xd64dce6f3f3e27b7afc5eda41ebab00556eaf946.sol#82-101) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- timeOfreservations[addressesReserving[i]] == 0 && ! pastTheLowest

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/24/0xd64dce6f3f3e27b7afc5eda41ebab00556eaf946.sol#71:
	- Usage of "throw" should be replaced with "revert()"

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/24/0xd64dce6f3f3e27b7afc5eda41ebab00556eaf946.sol#190:
	- Usage of "sha3()" should be replaced with "keccak256()"

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/24/0xd64dce6f3f3e27b7afc5eda41ebab00556eaf946.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.15 (/unique_chucks/24/0xd64dce6f3f3e27b7afc5eda41ebab00556eaf946.sol#1): it allows old versions
